queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kubeservice-custom-limitrange}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubeservice-custom-limitrange}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with wildcard RBAC permissions provide excessive rights to the Kubernetes API and should be avoided. The principle of least privilege recommends to specify only the set of needed objects and actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kubeservice-custom-limitrange}}.rules[1].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kubeservice-custom-limitrange}}.rules[1].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kubeservice-custom-limitrange}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubeservice-custom-limitrange}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kubeservice-custom-limitrange}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubeservice-custom-limitrange}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cert-manager-controller}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-webhook}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cert-manager-webhook}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-startupapicheck}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cert-manager-startupapicheck}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-cainjector}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cert-manager-cainjector}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined

queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-webhook}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cert-manager-webhook}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cert-manager-controller}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-cainjector}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cert-manager-cainjector}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-startupapicheck}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cert-manager-startupapicheck}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined

queries.description: Memory requests should be defined for each container. This allows the kubelet to reserve the requested amount of system resources and prevents over-provisioning on individual nodes

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-webhook}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cert-manager-webhook}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cert-manager-controller}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-startupapicheck}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cert-manager-startupapicheck}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-cainjector}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cert-manager-cainjector}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kubeservice-custom-limitrange}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubeservice-custom-limitrange}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined

queries.description: The permission to create pods in a cluster should be restricted because it allows privilege escalation.

files.expected_value: metadata.name=release-name-cert-manager-controller-challenges.rules.verbs should not contain the value 'create' when metadata.name=release-name-cert-manager-controller-challenges.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'
files.actual_value: metadata.name=release-name-cert-manager-controller-challenges.rules.verbs contains the value 'create' and metadata.name=release-name-cert-manager-controller-challenges.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'

queries.query_name: RBAC Roles with Read Secrets Permissions
queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with get/watch/list RBAC permissions on Kubernetes secrets are dangerous and should be avoided. In case of compromise, attackers could abuse these roles to access sensitive data, such as passwords, tokens and keys

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-controller-certificates}}.rules[4] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-controller-certificates}}.rules[4] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch, create, update, delete, patch) to Secrets objects

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-controller-challenges}}.rules[10] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-controller-challenges}}.rules[10] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch) to Secrets objects

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-controller-challenges}}.rules[3] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-controller-challenges}}.rules[3] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch) to Secrets objects

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-cainjector}}.rules[1] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-cainjector}}.rules[1] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch) to Secrets objects

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-controller-orders}}.rules[5] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-controller-orders}}.rules[5] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch) to Secrets objects

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-webhook:dynamic-serving}}.rules[0] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-webhook:dynamic-serving}}.rules[0] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch, update) to Secrets objects

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-controller-issuers}}.rules[2] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-controller-issuers}}.rules[2] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch, create, update, delete) to Secrets objects

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-controller-clusterissuers}}.rules[2] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-controller-clusterissuers}}.rules[2] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch, create, update, delete) to Secrets objects

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cert-manager-controller}}.readinessProbe should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-cainjector}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cert-manager-cainjector}}.readinessProbe should be defined

queries.description: Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kubeservice-custom-limitrange}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubeservice-custom-limitrange}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-webhook}}.automountServiceAccountToken should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-startupapicheck}}.automountServiceAccountToken should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-cainjector}}.automountServiceAccountToken should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager}}.automountServiceAccountToken should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-kubeservice-custom-limitrange}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles when binded, should not use get, list or watch as verbs

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-controller-challenges}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch"]]
The metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-controller-clusterissuers}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch", "create", "update", "delete"]]
The metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-cainjector}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch"]]
The metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-controller-challenges}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch"]]
The metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-controller-orders}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch"]]
The metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-controller-certificates}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch", "create", "update", "delete", "patch"]]
The metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-controller-issuers}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch", "create", "update", "delete"]]
The metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-webhook:dynamic-serving}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch", "update"]]

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests

spec.template.spec.containers.name=cert-manager-cainjector has resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=cert-manager-controller has resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=cert-manager-startupapicheck has resources defined

queries.description: CPU requests should be set to ensure the sum of the resource requests of the scheduled Containers is less than the capacity of the node

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=cert-manager-webhook should have resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=cert-manager-controller should have resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=cert-manager-cainjector should have resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=cert-manager-startupapicheck should have resources defined

queries.description: Deployments should be assigned with a PodDisruptionBudget to ensure high availability

files.expected_value: metadata.name=release-name-kubeservice-custom-limitrange is targeted by a PodDisruptionBudget
files.actual_value: metadata.name=release-name-kubeservice-custom-limitrange is not targeted by a PodDisruptionBudget

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-cainjector}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cert-manager-cainjector}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-cainjector}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cert-manager-cainjector}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-startupapicheck}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cert-manager-startupapicheck}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-startupapicheck}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cert-manager-startupapicheck}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cert-manager-controller}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cert-manager-controller}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-webhook}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cert-manager-webhook}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-webhook}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cert-manager-webhook}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Image tag must be defined and not be empty or equal to latest.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kubeservice-custom-limitrange}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubeservice-custom-limitrange}}.image tag is provided and not latest
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kubeservice-custom-limitrange}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubeservice-custom-limitrange}}.image tag is not provided or latest

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-webhook}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{cert-manager-webhook}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-webhook}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{cert-manager-webhook}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-cainjector}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{cert-manager-cainjector}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-cainjector}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{cert-manager-cainjector}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{cert-manager-controller}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{cert-manager-controller}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-startupapicheck}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{cert-manager-startupapicheck}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-startupapicheck}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{cert-manager-startupapicheck}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kubeservice-custom-limitrange}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{kubeservice-custom-limitrange}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kubeservice-custom-limitrange}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{kubeservice-custom-limitrange}}

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kubeservice-custom-limitrange}}.spec.containers.name={{kubeservice-custom-limitrange}}.securityContext.capabilities should be set

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-startupapicheck}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-startupapicheck}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-webhook}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-webhook}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-cainjector}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-cainjector}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kubeservice-custom-limitrange}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kubeservice-custom-limitrange}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager-startupapicheck}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cert-manager}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kubeservice-custom-limitrange}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
